org.opends.quicksetup.ui

Class UIFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.quicksetup.ui.UIFactory

  • public class UIFactory
extends Object
    This class provides constants an methods to create Swing objects and to generate UI elements with a common look and feel.

    When we want to change a color, a background or a font this is the class that should be modified.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UIFactory.IconType
      The following enumeration contains the different icons that we can have.
      static class  UIFactory.TextStyle
      The following enumeration contains the different text styles that we can have.

        size - the number of columns of the JTextField.

        a JTextField with the given icon, tooltip text, size and text style.

      • makeJPasswordField

      • makeHtmlPane

        public static JEditorPane makeHtmlPane(org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage text,
                                       Font font)

        Parameters:
        text - the text to be used to initialize the JEditorPane contents.
        font - the font to be used.
        Returns:
        a read only JEditorPane containing the provided text with the provided font.

        style - the TextStyle to be used.
        Returns:

      • applyFontToHtml

        public static String applyFontToHtml(String html,
                                     Font font)
        Returns a String that contains the html passed as parameter with a span applied. The span style corresponds to the Font specified as parameter. The goal of this method is to be able to specify a font for an HTML string.
        Parameters:
        html - the original html text.
        font - the font to be used to generate the new HTML.
        Returns:
        a string that represents the original HTML with the font specified as parameter.

        Returns:
